reviewText: Incredibly low quality video production. Just looks like someone took a camcorder to their kids little basketball practice.  Much of the video just shows babies rolling around the floor.

I bought this for my nephew who is 1.5 yrs.  He loves basketball already, and when ever he sees the TV he says, "Basketball?" asking us to put the movie on for him.  The music is tolerable when compared to some of the other movies my sister has for him.
